casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Wade Larry COLE. No. 324A94-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, for Cole. A. Danielle Marquis, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of June 2004 by Defendant to Defer Consideration of Petition for Writ of Certiorari (pending decision in State v Poindexter):

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of August 2004."
